60fc8265-099b-4603-943c-43c9b9b44aba.description: Earners of this certification have a thorough understanding of the Alteryx Designer environment. They are able to use the core toolset to clean, prepare, blend, parse, transform, and analyze data. Earners have demonstrated their ability to use the tools to solve real-world analytics problems.
60fc8265-099b-4603-943c-43c9b9b44aba.name: Alteryx Designer Core Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Achieving a passing score on the Alteryx Designer Core Exam - a 2 hour exam with multiple choice and practical application questions.

4acb5940-263f-4fcf-ba05-3a070d8a0cc6.description: Earners of this micro-credential have a basic understanding of data analytics concepts and key Designer functionality. They can identify data types and data formats as well as recognize the foundational elements of Alteryx Designer and associate the most used tools with their functionality.
4acb5940-263f-4fcf-ba05-3a070d8a0cc6.name: Alteryx Foundational Micro-Credential

badge_template_activities.title: Achieving a passing score on the Alteryx Foundation Micro-Credential – a 1 hour exam with multiple choice, multiple response, and matching questions.

a1b74636-211c-4f58-b96e-b81d79d6ea96.description: Earners of this certification have extensive knowledge of advanced functionality in Alteryx Designer. They are able to design analytic applications, build custom macros, analyze spatial data, perform advanced data preparation and analysis, and create reports with data visualizations. Earners have demonstrated their ability to use Designer to solve complex, real-world analytics problems.
a1b74636-211c-4f58-b96e-b81d79d6ea96.name: Alteryx Designer Advanced Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve a passing score on the Alteryx Designer Advanced Exam - a 2 hour assessment with practical application and multiple choice questions.
Alteryx Designer Core Certification

8bd5d1a3-6e73-4ca6-8bcf-114bb0bac513.description: Earners of this micro-credential have an introductory understanding of machine learning concepts. They can identify when to use machine learning techniques, how to prepare data for modeling, and the basics of machine learning model evaluation and interpretation.
8bd5d1a3-6e73-4ca6-8bcf-114bb0bac513.name: Machine Learning Foundation Micro-Credential

badge_template_activities.title: Achieving a passing score on the Alteryx Machine Learning Fundamentals Micro-Credential - a 1 hour exam with multiple choice, multiple response, and matching questions.

4eadaef9-3b94-4169-a7d6-1c6ca13b6a95.description: The badge earner understands the fundamentals of data preparation using Trifacta. They can create workflows, create transformations, execute and schedule jobs and use the tool to solve standard data challenges.
4eadaef9-3b94-4169-a7d6-1c6ca13b6a95.name: Trifacta Data Wrangler

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Trifacta Wrangler course.
Achieved 80% or higher on the exam and wrangling challenges for basic data preparation.

9b2786d1-37dc-434c-9dc6-6b2b3ae7c74b.description: Earners of this certification have a thorough understanding of how to administer and configure Alteryx Server.
9b2786d1-37dc-434c-9dc6-6b2b3ae7c74b.name: Server Administration

badge_template_activities.title: A candidate needs to demonstrate a high level of knowledge around Alteryx Server, specifically focusing on how to administer and configure the product.

9321e038-ba65-4fbf-b26a-14a16c087d39.description: The badge earner can solve advanced data challenges using the Trifacta tool. They are able to think outside the box and chain together complex series of transformations to clean and prepare their data.
9321e038-ba65-4fbf-b26a-14a16c087d39.name: Trifacta Data Deputy

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the advanced training for data preparation with Trifacta.
Achieved 80% or higher on multiple complex data cleaning challenges.

e0c45bb5-2edd-4e6b-ab1c-620e0a5127bd.description: The badge earner is a certified administrator of the Trifacta platform. They are able to basic debugging, tuning and maintenance of the Trifacta application, in addition to managing the user workspace.
e0c45bb5-2edd-4e6b-ab1c-620e0a5127bd.name: Trifacta Platform Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Trifacta Administration Course
Achieved 80% or higher on certification exam

a823f65f-f8d0-4774-af1f-23c7267a39f2.description: The badge earner understands the fundamentals of data preparation using Alteryx Designer Cloud. They can create workflows and transformations as well as execute and schedule jobs. Earners will be be able to use the Alteryx Designer Cloud to solve standard data challenges.
a823f65f-f8d0-4774-af1f-23c7267a39f2.name: Designer Cloud Core

badge_template_activities.title: Achieved 80% or higher on the Alteryx Designer Cloud Core certification exam.

c5ae4710-c03e-4b5b-a602-952e9c29033d.description: Earners of this certification have a comprehensive understanding of the entire Alteryx Designer platform. They are able to perform in-database analysis, create predictive models, analyze spatial data, and empower others with analytic applications, macros, and reports. Earners have demonstrated their ability to leverage the full breadth and depth of Designer functionality to address business challenges, solve complex analytics problems, and deliver automated analytic solutions.
c5ae4710-c03e-4b5b-a602-952e9c29033d.name: Alteryx Designer Expert Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve a passing score on the Alteryx Designer Expert exam - a 3 hour performance-based / practical application exam.
Alteryx Designer Advanced Certification

50ceccc2-491f-49e9-b40a-2bfa235ffe51.description: The Alteryx Subject Matter Expert badge recognizes and rewards SMEs for their valuable contributions to help shape the future of learning and certification and improve the customer experience.
50ceccc2-491f-49e9-b40a-2bfa235ffe51.name: Alteryx Subject Matter Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Be an Alteryx associate and complete two to four activities such as Course Content Development, Validation, Pilot, Item Writing, QA Test, Script Review, etc. Activities are monitored and recorded by Alteryx Customer Enablement team.

f403209c-3bf5-466e-a7ef-7fbb53eed78e.description: The badge earner can solve advanced data challenges using Alteryx Designer Cloud. They are able to think outside the box and chain together complex series of transformations to clean and prepare their data.
f403209c-3bf5-466e-a7ef-7fbb53eed78e.name: Designer Cloud Advanced

badge_template_activities.title: Achieved 80% or higher on the Alteryx Designer Cloud Advanced certification exam.

2feb6d36-9681-4e20-8483-f1c110b987b8.description: The badge earner is a certified administrator of the Alteryx Designer Cloud platform. They are able to perform basic debugging, tuning, and maintenance of the Alteryx Designer Cloud, in addition to managing the user workspace.
2feb6d36-9681-4e20-8483-f1c110b987b8.name: Designer Cloud Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Achieved 80% or higher on the Alteryx Designer Cloud certification exam.

06dc1077-cb70-4206-958f-d09aff0cfd83.description: Earners of this certification have a comprehensive understanding of how to leverage Alteryx Designer in the data science lifecycle. They are able to perform data investigation, create predictive models, interpret fit statistics and model reports, communicate results, and make recommendations. Earners have demonstrated their ability to select algorithms to model datasets, train, evaluate, and compare predictive models, and score new data.
06dc1077-cb70-4206-958f-d09aff0cfd83.name: Alteryx Predictive Master Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve a passing score on the Alteryx Predictive Master exam - a 3 hour performance-based / practical application exam.
Alteryx Designer Advanced Certification

f738bd52-2081-4f5a-a669-95806970e0bd.description: The badge earner has advanced understanding and hands-on experience with Trifacta. They are able to create complex, optimized data pipelines and deliver use cases using Trifacta's orchestration and collaborative features.
f738bd52-2081-4f5a-a669-95806970e0bd.name: Trifacta Data Ranger

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a 2 day training course covering the advanced features of Trifacta
Designed and delivered a custom data pipeline

50f396d6-7e02-4453-9abc-be45973a5102.description: Earners of this badge are Trifacta or Alteryx employees who serve as subject matter experts for customers in the Trifacta Community and have accumulated at least 20 engagement points during 2022. Engagement points are granted based on discussion contributions, blog posts, knowledge base article contributions, or authoring monthly challenges. Level 1 SMEs are committed to sharing or learning content related to Trifacta and data engineering.
50f396d6-7e02-4453-9abc-be45973a5102.name: Trifacta Community SME Level 1

badge_template_activities.title: Must be a Trifacta or Alteryx employee and member of the Trifacta online community
Demonstrated exceptional levels of professionalism when interacting in the community
Has contributed multiple answers, blogs, knowledge articles, or monthly challenges

54a920e5-3dea-47c3-9b5f-143ee9566eea.description: Earners of this badge are Trifacta or Alteryx employees who serve as subject matter experts for customers in the Trifacta Community and have accumulated at least 50 engagement points during 2022. Engagement points are granted based on discussion contributions, blog posts, knowledge base article contributions, or authoring monthly challenges. Level 2 SMEs are essential Trifacta community advocates and are developing reputations for thought leadership and technical expertise.
54a920e5-3dea-47c3-9b5f-143ee9566eea.name: Trifacta Community SME Level 2

badge_template_activities.title: Must be a Trifacta or Alteryx employee and member of the Trifacta online community
Demonstrated exceptional levels of professionalism when interacting in the community
Has contributed multiple answers, blogs, knowledge articles, or monthly challenges
Trifacta Community SME Level 1

f94f160a-4b59-4fe9-95a6-b34005eb7135.description: This badge earner has mastered all things data wrangling and Trifacta. They have built and delivered production-level data pipelines for multiple projects and are a thought-leader in the data preparation space.
f94f160a-4b59-4fe9-95a6-b34005eb7135.name: Trifacta Data Marshal

badge_template_activities.title: Design and deliver multiple production-level data pipelines

4f3c1bdd-ddcc-4ac2-816d-5192f9725e97.description: Earners of this badge are Trifacta or Alteryx employees who serve as subject matter experts for customers in the Trifacta Community and have accumulated at least 100 engagement points during 2022. Engagement points are granted based on discussion contributions, blog posts, knowledge base article contributions, or authoring monthly challenges. Level 3 SMEs are passionate Trifacta champions who actively share knowledge and are recognized as thought leaders and technical experts.
4f3c1bdd-ddcc-4ac2-816d-5192f9725e97.name: Trifacta Community SME Level 3

badge_template_activities.title: Must be a Trifacta or Alteryx employee and member of the Trifacta online community
Demonstrated exceptional levels of professionalism when interacting in the community
Has contributed multiple answers, blogs, knowledge articles, or monthly challenges
Trifacta Community SME Level 1
Trifacta Community SME Level 2
